title: Wouldn't it be better to lift the Cuban embargo, which would help the people and expose the government's excuse? - Quora
tags: Government in the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Yes, of course. It would help the Cuban people, remove the excuses for the Cuban Government’s mishandling of the economy, open Cuba to US tourism and businesses, which in turn bring cultural change (something Cuba is uniquely primed for) and overall be a net win for everyone on both countries. Except for the old guard of the Cuban American exile and the Cuban government hardliners, that is. But those are two groups I couldn’t care less about.
